Notes:

there are only 2 cams out for this movie, and it doesnt look like there will be coming any more. web-dl maybe in a month or later
The first cam i got was steady but way too dark,you couldnt see anything. But it had great audio.
The new cam is good and bright, with ok-ish audio. Only has slight cam moves up and down occasionally but they last only secs.
will do just fine

Encode:

took the center of the cam,cropped black bars to highest and lowest point at top and bottom, so when cam moves a bit up and down you wont loose viewable video
added brightness and sharpness,fixed colouring best as possible
btw. video is complete but feel free to go thru it frame by frame to find out for yourself as some do

took the better cam-audio,cleaned it through and lipsynced it to my video
audio is clear and fully understandable see sample

got nice
will do me till retail
enjoy
